QuestData.Title: Adventurers Wanted: Scarlet Monastery
QuestData.Description: King Anduin Wrynn has requested able-bodied adventurers to assault the Scarlet Monastery, northeast of the Undercity, immediately!$B$BRepeated efforts to negotiate with the Scarlet Crusade have failed. Their zealotry is wreaking havoc across the reclaimed plaguelands and elsewhere.$b$bReport to the Scarlet Monastery to dish out the King's justice. Use of deadly force is encouraged!
